Title: DAYOFMONTH()
Description: Return the day of the month (0-31)

Returns the day of the month for
          date, in the range
          1 to 31, or
          0 for dates such as
          '0000-00-00' or
          '2008-00-00' that have a zero day part.
          Returns NULL if
          date is NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT DAYOFMONTH('2007-02-03');
        -> 3
